def_cn: 强调的;着重的;加强语气的
def_en: An emphatic response or statement is one made in a forceful way, because the speaker feels very strongly about what they are saying.

def_cn: 措词强烈的;断然的;坚决的
def_en: If you are emphatic about something, you use forceful language which shows that you feel very strongly about what you are saying.
An emphatic win or victory is one in which the winner has won by a large amount or distance.
